title: The Gift of Affection
itunes:summary:
A small note, a gentle hug, a tender kiss. These things can add so much to your marriage. But what do you do when you don't feel like being affectionate? John Fuller and Erin Smalley remind us that we can still choose to be romantic with our mate, even when we don't feel like it. Featuring Matt and Lisa Jacobson.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the "100 Ways to Love" book bundle for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-07-01?refcd=1119502

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/the-gift-of-affection/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
